Module de.nicrizzos
Package de.nicrizzos.game.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.nicrizzos.game.GameObject
de.nicrizzos.game.entities.Entity
de.nicrizzos.game.entities.Player
public class Player
extends Entity
Represents the player object. It contains all the necessary fields and methods to create and maintain a player object.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Nico Piel
See Also:
Entity

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String _name)
      Creates a new player object with the given name and the id "player".
      Parameters:
      _name - The player's name to be used in various ways.

  • Method Details

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer​(java.lang.String _name) throws GameException
      Use this to first set the player's stats. Cannot be called a second time.
      Parameters:
      _name - The new player's name.
      Throws:
      GameException - Thrown, if there somehow already is a player object.

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Use this function to level-up.

    • increaseStat

      public void increaseStat​(java.lang.String _stat)
      Use this to increase certain stats by 1
      Parameters:
      _stat - Use stat in lowercase, e.g. "strength", "lightFooted", "slightOfHand"

      public double getExperiencePercentage()

      Returns:
